name: Knockout Master (itch)
description:
Hi there!

My Name is MooN and I'm currently developing a game called "Knockout Master", an adult themed visual novel.

Become a Patreon and support the development of the game here:

https://www.patreon.com/MooNVN

My Game is still under development, the first version (Round 1) is Available Now for FREE!

Knockout Master !

K.O Master follows the story of 21 year old male, as he begins his career in boxing. The Main Character will make choices along the way that will affect the final outcome.

Genre:

3DCG, Animated, Male protagonist, Vaginal sex, Combat, Oral sex, Voyeurism, Romance, Violence

Release Date October 05, 2019

Game Updated October 06, 2019.
